properties.description: Updates the Cow Dim table in the PostGreDWH, by inserting new cows and updating excisting ones with new information while flagging old ones as on

transformations.name: activeDBcows
transformations.description: filter end_dates with a null value

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as long,
		condition as string,
		life_number as string,
		responder1 as long,
		responder2 as long,
		responder3 as string,
		number as integer,
		uuid as string,
		group_id as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> StagingCows
source(output(
		dim_cow_id as integer,
		lifenumber as string,
		leg_responder as long,
		neck_responder as long,
		cownumber as integer,
		nedap_id as long,
		start_date as date,
		end_date as date,
		group as integer,
		last_updated as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> DWHCows
CreateDateTimestamp filter(isNull(end_date) == true()) ~> activeDBcows
activeDBcows, StagingCows exists(lifenumber == life_number,
	negate:true,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> removedcows
activeDBcows, StagingCows exists(lifenumber == life_number,
	negate:false,
	broadcast: 'auto')~> activatecows
DWHCows derive(current_date = currentDate(),
		current_timestamp = currentTimestamp()) ~> CreateDateTimestamp
removedcows alterRow(updateIf(true())) ~> UpdateIfTrue
UpdateIfTrue sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		dim_cow_id as integer,
		lifenumber as string,
		leg_responder as long,
		neck_responder as long,
		cownumber as integer,
		nedap_id as long,
		start_date as date,
		end_date as date,
		group as integer,
		last_updated as timestamp
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:false,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['lifenumber'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		dim_cow_id,
		lifenumber,
		leg_responder,
		neck_responder,
		cownumber,
		nedap_id,
		start_date,
		end_date = current_date,
		group,
		last_updated
	)) ~> SetCowEnddate
